fullText:
Fate's Warning

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Cleric, divine fortune power, must worship the Raven Queen
Benefit: Whenever you hit with an attack or succeed on a saving throw benefiting from divine fortune, you also gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn

Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 64.
name: Fate's Warning

benefit: Whenever you hit with an attack or succeed on a saving throw benefiting from divine fortune, you also gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn
